title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, I have noticed that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not. This behavior is inconsistent and not expected.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, either both the Open Project and Close Project options should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the Navigator 
2. Select both P1 and P2 
3. Observe that the Open Project option is available, but the Close Project option is not
